name: Emergency Feed-Pouch
description: On a Befriend Creature crit fail, the additional beast creature has -2 to its AC and saving throws.

name: Backup Feed-Pouch
description: On a Befriend Creature sub fail, all foes in the triggered encounter has -1 to their AC and saving throws.

name: Feed-Pouch
description: On a Befriend Creature succ, the temporary hit points increase by 1.

name: Superior Feed-Pouch
description: On a Befriend Creature sub succ, the minion is 1 CR higher. Additionally, when upgraded, the minion gains 1 additional AC and AB.

name: Legendary Feed-Pouch
description: On a Befriend Creature crit succ, you can roll twice on the Boon table and choose which result to take.

name: Emergency Music Box
description: On a Busk crit fail, the amount of gold lost is reduced by 3.

name: Backup Music Box
description: On a Busk sub fail, the amount of gold lost is reduced by 1.

name: Music Box
description: On a Busk succ, 1 additional gold is gained.

name: Superior Music Box
description: On a Busk sub succ, 3 additional gold is gained.

name: Legendary Music Box
description: On a Busk crit succ, you can roll twice for the loot roll and choose which result to take.
